title: Keyword Extractor
original_prompt:
Extract the keywords with the score in JSON format from the following content

{content:The main weakness of these GPT models is that they are costly to efficiently run in production and they require some advanced DevOps knowledge.  For example you should forget about running GPT-J on your own local machine or even on a CPU server. If you want it to extract your entity in a decent time (below 1 second), you will need to use a good GPU like NVIDIA RTX A6000 or NVIDIA A40.}
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "content": [
            "The main weakness of these GPT models is that they are costly to efficiently run in production",
            "they require some advanced DevOps knowledge",
            "you should forget about running GPT-J on your own local machine or even on a CPU server",
            "If you want it to extract your entity in a decent time (below 1 second)",
            "you will need to use a good GPU like NVIDIA RTX A6000 or NVIDIA A40"
        ],
        "keywords": [
            "GPT models",
            "costly",
            "efficiently run",
            "production",
            "advanced DevOps knowledge",
            "GPT-J",
            "local machine",
            "CPU server",
            "extract entity",
            "decent time",
            "below 1 second",
            "good GPU",
            "NVIDIA RTX A6000",
            "NVIDIA A40"
        ],
        "score": [
            "weakness",
            "cost",
            "efficiency",
            "knowledge requirement",
            "performance",
            "hardware requirement"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: {content: The rapid advancements in AI technology have led to the development of various models, including GPT-3 and its successors. However, these models often require significant computational resources, making them expensive to deploy. For instance, running a model like GPT-3 on a local machine is impractical without a high-end GPU. Additionally, the complexity of setting up the necessary infrastructure can be a barrier for many organizations.}
input2: {content: As artificial intelligence continues to evolve, the demand for powerful models like GPT-4 has surged. These models, while highly effective, come with their own set of challenges. The cost of cloud-based solutions can quickly add up, and the need for specialized hardware, such as TPUs or advanced GPUs, is essential for optimal performance. Furthermore, the expertise required to manage and maintain these systems can deter smaller companies from leveraging AI technology effectively.}
